name: Super Furry World Coin Minigame
description:
This is an early test for a game I want to make called Super Furry World. I do plan on that name being a placeholder for now though. 

The controls are the arrow keys to move. Left, right, up, down.

The goal of the game is to get all the money (1000) to complete the minigame.

The secondary goal is to beat your high score and develop the fastest coin collecting rout.

Bronze coin is worth 1 point, silver coin is worth 5 points, gold coin is worth 25 point, and money bag is worth 100 coins.

If you have any feedback you would like to give, let me know in the comments.

I used music and sound effects from Rayman 1 & 2 for this game
